page.title: 12SUNDAY SCHOOL
page.content: On Sunday I go to Sunday School. It is connected with Bishops Itchington {St. Michael's Church.} I first of all get my collection money and on the way to the church I call for Christopher Taylor. At ll.OO a.m. we both walk up to the church together. When we get there we put our collection in the pot before anyone else can. Mrs. Timms the{Sunday School teacher}starts to tell us some interesting stories, and facts about{Jesus Christ.} At l2.OO noon they give us all a leaflet and in this leaflet are questions on what we have learnt this week. Once we have got our leaflet we set off for home. At home I get a pen and start on my leaflet. Sometimes I have to get my{Bible}and look up a passage to get some of the answers. Next week if it is correct I will get a star on the star chart.
